title: WTB - 5 cards from REA lot 294: 1911 T3 Turkey Red Collection (26)
author: chadeast

posts.post_title: WTB - 5 cards from REA lot 294: 1911 T3 Turkey Red Collection (26)
posts.post_content:
Long shot, I know, but if the buyer of REA lot #294 is reading this and is interested in selling some of the T3s, I'm very interested in at least 5 of them. Thanks,
Chad
I bought it, I will be keeping several and selling off some of the lower grade ones, plus a few others I have already....
